舘字的基本解释

舘
guǎn
同“馆”。

舘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guǎn］
［《廣韻》古玩切，去换，見。］
［《集韻》古緩切，上緩，見。］
“管2”的被通假字。“馆1”的繁体字。亦作“舘1”。
(1)客舍；招待宾客居住的房舍。
(2)华丽的住宅，宫馆。
(3)指非通途大道设的驿站的房舍。
(4)官署名。
(5)太平天囯泛指一切单位的基层组织为“館”。相当于“衙”。
(6)旧时私塾。
(7)就馆，教私塾。
(8)储藏、陈列文物或进行文体活动的场所。
(9)供客人饮食娱乐的场所。
(10)寓居；留宿。
(11)指使居住；安置。
(12)古代祭祀时盛放祭品的筐。
(13)犹照顾。

舘字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【舌字部】　舘； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1007第25
【字彙】俗館字。

舘字的源字形

暂无。

Pavilion
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guǎn］
["Guangyun" antiques cut, change it, see you. ]
["Jiyun" ancient slow cut, upper slow, see. ]
"Tube 2" was passed falsely. Traditional characters for "館1". Also known as "Hall 1".
(1) Guest house; a house where guests live.
(2) Gorgeous residence, palace hall.
(3) Refers to the premises of the post station on the non-Tongtu Avenue.
(4) Official signature.
(5) The Taiping Heavenly Kingdom generally refers to the basic organization of all units as the "library." Equivalent to "ya".
(6) The old private school.
(7) In the library, teach private school.
(8) Places for storing and displaying cultural relics or conducting cultural and sports activities.
(9) A place for guests to eat and drink.
(10) Residence; stay overnight.
(11) Instruct to live; resettlement.
(12) Baskets used to hold sacrifices in ancient sacrifices.
(13) Still take care of.
